title: Distributed pytorch in testing.
body_html:
Hi, I am trying to do distributed running when the CNN is producing result (I want to reduce the time in test(), not to accelerate on training, because I want to produce in-time result), on multiple nodes or maybe nultiple GPUs on one computer.
I know this is rare, and I am thinking is it possible to do this? Or is there precedent work on this?

body:
Hi, I am trying to do distributed running when the CNN is producing result (I want to reduce the time in test(), not to accelerate on training, because I want to produce in-time result), on multiple nodes or maybe nultiple GPUs on one computer.
I know this is rare, and I am thinking is it possible to do this? Or is there precedent work on this?
